title: how do i know i gaind point during team up week
body: i didn't get the pool party icon and i am sure i played at least 5 premade games during the team up weeks can someone help me with this

replies.body:
Hey moon55,

Unfortunately, there isn't a way to tell if you gained points during Team Up Week. In order to earn a point, you needed to win a 5 man premade game. In addition, players who exhibited excessive negative behavior since February won’t unlock the Pool Party icon.

hi riot kateykhaos i am sure during the team up week i had at least 4 premade games but i am not sure if i gained any point btw i didn't get any chat restriction i only had  leaverbuster looby the 5 game thing

LeaverBuster was one (but certainly not all) of the criteria used to calculate negative behavior. 

You would have gained a point in the four games you played if you won the match,
ty alot for you help i did contact the Support and i am waiting for replays

Win 1 5 man pre made game on aram/sr/misc maps
no one has the icon, you will get a mystery champ soon too.

misc maps... 

Couldn't have said Crystal Scar? I am offended.
